title: Chat not working
body:
My roommate and I were playing a game of league. After the game we were both disconnected from chat while our teammates who we were voice chatting with remained connected to chat. We can still queue for games solo but can no longer form groups. We've reset our clients, computers and router to try to solve the problem but it still persists. Is there any other Issue that could be causing this. The internet on both computers in still working as well as all other internet related chat services i.e. Battle.net, Steam and Curse Voice. It appears as if that chat itself is the only thing being blocked. We're hoping for any suggestions anyone might have.

Edit: It Appears there is a common trend involving Comcast customers in Utah, New Mexico, Arizona and Colorado

replies.body: Everyone make sure to upvote the main post so this issue gets noticed and resolved.

It wouldn't be an issue if they actually let people type in user names for ranked 5's, but since they don't... If you guys are trying to play anything else just type your friends names in manually. Hope that helps some of you.
This worked for me
Great. We should have this sorted out for now. Thanks for your help.
Thanks!
Albuquerque, New Mexico. Comcast aswell :(R.I.P Friends List
Same in Utah, very unfortunate this happened again already.
Comcast, Utah.
Same issue, comcast in Albuquerque.
Same Comcast in CO
Colorado(surrounding states) + Comcast, is the issue it looks like, we just have to spam call them guys, i'm already spam calling them it'll work.
I am having the same issue as of 10 minutes ago. I log in, cannot connect to chat server. Comcast in Tucson.
Same here. Comcast in CO as well.
Comcast in CO as well. Please fix.
Yeah, I am also having the same issue, Comcast in CO. Wondering why it's happening, tried resetting computer and it changes nothing. Doesnt even show me if friends are online.
Also have Comcast and colorado here Q-Q
Colorado and Comcast. Upvoted in hopes for a fix. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Plz fix soon riot.

Same, and I am having weird issues related to connectivity to PVP.net as well.  If it matters, I tried flushing my DNS and closing/reopening the client and have had no success.  Also, connecting through Comcast in Colorado.

My friend and I are having the same issue. We don't know what. Another of our friend's client is working fine though.
Thank you for working hard on xmas eve :)

Still not working. =\
-Colorado/Comcast

Chat still dced @ (2:35pm). Restarted client and still failing to reconnect chat.

Can you restart your client and let us know how it looks then? Chat traffic moved around for a moment while some devices in Denver were brought back into service.
I restarted it, back to square one, with 0 friends and no connection. i posted trace results on the trace comment if that helps

ABQ, NM. Comcast. Got chat back about 5min ago (2:15pm)... but 2 minutes later back into the disconnect hell. (2:23pm)
Edit again.. It's on and off.

Can you let us know how this is looking now? If you're still having issues, could you try and paste the results of a traceroute to 192.64.174.69?

(Windows - open a command prompt and run tracert 192.64.174.69)
(OSX - open a terminal window and run traceroute 192.64.174.69)

Thanks

Working now.  Thanks!  Merry Christmas!
Ayy Colorado represent. Still not working for me. Comcast

Guess whos back~
Back again~
Our old Friend~
Mr Chat Service
Is bein really dufus
I wish we could have
a fix right quick
but its Christmas
so riots gettin shitfaced~

Comcast/AZ here. Same problem, started last night.

Edit: Called Comcast and told them this was a systemic problem in Western states, the agent said nothing related to "Riot Games" or "League of Legends" came up in the call log. This is clearly a Comcast server problem and not Riot's. God I love my ISP!
chat still down colorado/comcast {{item:3070}}
Not working in UT w/ Comcast. Shame I really want to play with my buds.
Comcast in Denver, CO
Wow, still not working chat in Utah!

I have comcast internet at home and also have google fiber.
I changed my connect from comcast to google fiber, and I can see the chat!!!!
Comcast is the best right now I guess.... AMIRITE
i as well as of 1030 my caht has been down. >.<
also comcast nm

This has been happening ever since the servers got moved. First it was the week after the server moved for Colorado and Utah based Comcast customers. Then about 3 week later for a 3 day period and now. This is an issue just with Utah and Colorado based Comcast customers. Every time I think Riot has it figured out it happens again. Wish we could find a permanent solution.

Same here, Comcast in CO.

Must be a Comcast issue in the region.
